articles.author: Imogen Piper, Evan Hill, Maham Javaid, Rick Noack
articles.title: Indian strikes on Pakistan damaged six airfields, Post analysis finds - The Washington Post
articles.description: A review of satellite images and aftermath videos found that the strikes damaged three hangars, two runways and a pair of mobile buildings used by the air force.
articles.content: Indian strikes Saturday on Pakistan damaged runways and structures across at least six airfields, according to a visual analysis by The Washington Post, which experts said were the most significant a… [+6227 chars]
